sentences.text: Notice of Annual Meeting of Stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Wednesday, May 3, 2017 1:30 p.m., Pacific time Le Meridien 333 Battery St. San Francisco, California 94111
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: date of this proxy statement is MARCH 23, 2017

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 23, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Dear Stockholder,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You are invited to attend our Annual Meeting of Stockholders on May 3, 2017 in San Francisco, California.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains information about our company and our 2017 annual meeting proposals and process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is important to us, and we ask that you vote in accordance with our boards recommendations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a year of significant accomplishment at Prologis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our results were a testament to the strength of our globa portfolio.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our team delivered record occupancy with double-digit rent growth, significant value creation by our development business and an increase in strategic capital fees and promotes.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I am proud of what our experienced and dedicated teams across the globe have accomplished and look forward to the year ahead.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thank you for your continued support and interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sincerely,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: HAMID R. MOGHADAM Chairman and Chief Executive Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2017 Proxy Statement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NOTICE OF 2017 ANNUAL MEETING OF STOCKHOLDERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: March 23, 2017
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To our Stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: I invite you to attend the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders of Prologis, Inc. at 1:30 p.m. on May 3, 2017 at Le Meridien at 333 Battery Street, San Francisco, California 94111.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Items of business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following items of business will be conducted at our 2017 annual meeting of stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 1. To elect ten directors to our board of directors to serve until the next annual meeting of stockholders and until their successors are duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2. Advisory vote to approve the companys executive compensation for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 3. Advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on the companys executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 4. To ratify the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the yea 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 5. To consider any other matters that may properly come before the meeting and at any adjournments or postponements of the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: How to Vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can vote your shares by proxy through the Internet, by telephone or by mail using the instructions on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proxy may be revoked in the manner described in the accompanying proxy statement at any time prior to its exercise at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Record Date.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you were a holder of shares of our common stock at the close of business on March 9, 2017, you are entitled to receive this notice and to vote at the annual meeting and any adjournment(s) or postponement(s) of the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Meeting Attendance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you plan to attend the meeting in person, you must bring proof of current ownership of our common stock to be admitted to and to attend the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 24, 2017, we intend to distribute to our stockholders:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) Either in printed form by mail or electronically by e-mail, a Notice of Annual Meeting and Internet Availability of Proxy Materials containing instructions on:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) how to electronically access our 2017 Proxy Statement and 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, which includes our 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) how to vote; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (c) how to request printed proxy materials (if desired).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) If requested or required, printed proxy materials, which will include our 2017 Proxy Statement, our 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K and a proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) We calculate our outperformance by comparing the aggregate dollar value of our actual TSR versus the aggregate value of our TSR had it tracked the growth of the MSCI REIT Index over the same period of time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate dollar value of our TSR is generally the sum of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the increase in value of existing and newly issued shares, plus
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) cumulative dividends including reinvestment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see our Prologis Outperformance Plan (POP) for further detail regarding the outperformance calculation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prologis aggregate TSR over 2014-2016 was $11.0 billion vs. $8.2 billion had our stock performance matched the performance of the index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This calculation uses a market capitalization for Prologis of $18.7 billion at the beginning of the three-year period and $28.3 billion at the end of such period, a 51% increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) The total value created in exceeding the promote hurdles is calculated by determining our ownership share of the growth in net asset value during the incentive period, gross of any promote accrual for the applicable ventures, adding in management fees paid to Prologis by such ventures during the same period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total value created in exceeding the promote hurdles excludes equity transactions that, while impacting net asset value, did not create value for the fund, such as capital contributions, returns of capital, etc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also excludes Prologis ownership share of management fees paid to Prologis by the ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The promotes relevant to this calculation were the promotes related to the PPP awards paid in 2016.

sentences.text: Proposals Submitted to Vote at the 2017 Annual Meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are asking our stockholders of record on March 9, 2017 to vote on the following matters at our 2017 annual meeting of stockholders to be held on May 3, 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see the section entitled Additional Information for details on how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 1: Election of Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the annual meeting you will be asked to elect to the board of directors (the Board) of Prologis, Inc. the ten persons nominated by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The directors will be elected to one-year terms and will hold office until the 2018 annual meeting and until their successors are duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proposal 2: Advisory Vote to Approve the Companys Executive Compensation for 2016
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At the annual meeting you will be asked to approve a resolution on the companys executive compensation for 2016 as reported in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Vote Required: You may vote for, vote against or abstain from voting to approve the resolution on the companys executive compensation for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming a quorum is present, to be approved by the stockholders, the proposal must receive the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of common stock present in person or by proxy at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes, if any, are considered shares present in person or by proxy and thus will have the same effect as votes cast Against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: roposal Board Recommendation Proposal 3: Advisory Vote on the Frequency of Future Advisory Votes on the Companys Executive Compensation  At the annual meeting you will be asked to vote on whether future advisory votes on the companys executive compensation should occur every year, every two years or every three years.

sentences.text: Vote Required: You will be able to specify, through your vote, one of four choices on your proxy card: one year, two years, three years or abstain.

sentences.text: You are voting to indicate your choice of frequency options.

sentences.text: The non-binding vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation will be the frequency receiving the greatest number of votes at the annual meeting.

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes, if any, will have no effect on the outcome of this proposal.

sentences.text: The Board currently consists of ten directors, all of whom, except Christine Garvey, are standing to be elected to the Board at the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders to hold office until the 2018 annual meeting and until their successors are duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ms. Garvey will be retiring prior to the annual meeting in accordance with our retirement age limits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has nominated Olivier Piani as a new director nominee to stand for election to the Board at our 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has affirmatively determined that all of the director nominees, other than Hamid Moghadam, are independent directors in accordance with New York Stock Exchange (NYSE) rules, our governance guidelines and our bylaws.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws provide for a majority voting standard for the election of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See Additional Information Majority Voting below for further detail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not know of any reason why any nominee would be unable or unwilling to serve as a director, if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, if a nominee becomes unable to serve or will not serve, proxies may be voted for the election of such other person nominated by the Board as a substitute or the Board may reduce the number of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the director nominees has consented to be named in this proxy statement and to serve as a director if elected.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information about each director nominees share ownership is presented below under Security Ownership.

sentences.text: Certain of the director nominees previously served on the board of ProLogis (the Trust).

sentences.text: In June 2011, AMB Property Corporation (AMB) and the Trust completed a merger transaction (the Merger) and, effective with the Merger, our name was changed from AMB Property Corporation to Prologis, Inc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The shares represented by the proxies received will be voted for the election of each of the ten nominees named below, unless you indicate in the proxy that your vote should be cast against any or all of the director nominees or that you abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each nominee elected as a director will continue in office until his or her successor has been duly elected and qualified, or until the earliest of his or her resignation, retirement or death.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The ten nominees for election to the Board at the 2017 annual meeting, all proposed by the Board, are listed below with brief biographies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that the stockholders vote FOR the election of each nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Evaluations and Process for Selecting Directors
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the annual Board evaluation process, the Governance Committee evaluates our directors in light of current needs of the Board and the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, during the course of the year, the committee discusses Board succession and reviews potential candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee may also retain a third party to assist in identifying potential nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual Board evaluation process involves assessments at the Board, Board committee and individual director levels.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These annual evaluations are conducted by the chair of the Governance Committee and our lead independent director and, at least every two years, by an independent third party.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through this process, the Board determines who should be nominated to stand for election based on current company and Board needs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance guidelines provide that directors will not be nominated or appointed to the Board if they are, or would be, 72 years or older at the time of the election or appointment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Term limits on directors service have not been instituted.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Qualifications, Skills and Experience
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each of the director nominees was chosen to serve on the Board based on his or her qualifications, skills and experience, as discussed in their biographies, and how those characteristics supplement the resources and talent on the Board and serve the current needs of the Board and the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For information about our business, its strategy and goals, please see Compensation Discussion and Analysis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In making its nominations, the Governance Committee also assessed each director nominee by a number of key characteristics, including integrity, experience, accountability, judgment, courage to voice opinions, supportiveness in working with others and willingness to commit the time needed to satisfy the requirements of Board and committee membership.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While the Governance Committee does not have a formal policy regarding diversity, the committee considers diversity in gender, ethnic background, geographic origin and professional experience in assessing director nominees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board composition and refreshment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee is focused on ensuring that the Board reflects a diversity of experience, skills and backgrounds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As Christine Garvey will retire from the Board prior to our annual meeting having reached our board retirement age limits, the committee is focused on identifying other qualified diverse director candidates with commensurate experience and background.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Boards current pool of potential candidates are mostly female and/or otherwise diverse candidates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In evaluating the current needs of the Board and the company, the Governance Committee identified a need for geographic diversity and additional expertise in international markets and fund operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model requires a growing presence in markets outside of the U.S. to serve the needs of our customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategic capital partners provide the capital in local regions to fund our business in such markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, a substantial portion of our assets under management (AUM) outside of the U.S. is held in our strategic capital ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With his vast experience in fund management in Europe, Olivier Piani is an exceptional director candidate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: European in background, Mr. Piani brings geographic diversity and experience to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to his retirement, Mr. Piani was chief executive officer of Allianz Real Estate, where he grew a platform of real estate assets by more than 50 billion worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Piani also built the pan-European platform for GE Capital Real Estate, which had more than 500 employees in seven countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By tenure, the Board will comprise two directors in the 0-4 year category and four directors in each of the 5-10 year and the 10-plus year categories (if Mr. Piani is elected at our annual meeting).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This mix provides a balance of experience and institutional knowledge with fresh perspectives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: stribution of Director Nominee Tenure 0  4 Years 10+ Years 5  10 Years Distribution of Director Nominee Tenure(1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Does not include Ms. Garvey, who is retiring prior to the annual meeting per our retirement age policy, and includes Mr. Piani in the 0-4 year category and Mr. Moghadam in the 10+ year category
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is committed to regular refreshment to maintain an optimal balance of different perspectives and proper oversight over the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board was completely refreshed and rebuilt at the time of the Merger in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Merger essentially created a new company with a new operating and corporate platform.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: At that time, all directors underwent intensive review to determine which directors would best fit the newly created combined company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director selected in this rebuilding process was onboarded as a new director to the newly established company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These directors were required to perform in a new governance environment, with new structures, processes, committees, charters and guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have continued to refresh the Board since the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: David OConnor onboarded as a new director in 2015, and Mr. Piani is a new director nominee in this annual election.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our director candidate search process actively identifies and assesses a pool of potential candidates through a variety of sources.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This process will serve to continue to refresh the Board and maintain a balanced mix of new perspectives and experience.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Independence
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We require that a majority of the Board be independent in accordance with NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To determine whether a director is independent, the Board must affirmatively determine that there is no direct or indirect material relationship between the company and the director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 90% of the Board is independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has determined that all of our directors, other than our chairman, Mr. Moghadam, are independent (including new director nominee, Mr. Piani).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board reached this determination after considering all relevant facts and circumstances, reviewing director questionnaires and considering transactions and relationships, if any, between us, our affiliates, our executive officers and their affiliates, and each of the directors and prospective director, members of each of their immediate families, and their affiliates.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit, Compensation and Governance Committees are 100% independent.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has also determined that all members of the Audit, Compensation and Governance Committees of the Board are independent in accordance with NYSE and Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Leadership Structure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance guidelines do not specify a leadership structure for the Board, allowing the Board the flexibility to choose the best option for the company as circumstances warrant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that strong independent leadership ensures effective oversight over the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such independent oversight is maintained through:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our lead independent director;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: our independent directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: the Audit, Compensation and Governance Committees, which are all comprised entirely of independen directors;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: annual review of the Board leadership structure and effectiveness of oversight through the Board evaluation process; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: strong adherence to our governance guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our independent directors have the ability to provide input for meeting agendas and are encouraged to raise topics for discussion by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board and each Board committee has complete and open access to any member of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each committee has the authority to retain independent legal, financial and other advisors as they deem appropriate without consulting or obtaining the approval of any member of management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board also holds regularly scheduled executive sessions of only independent directors in order to promote free and open discussion among the independent directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Chairman and CEO assessment
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our chairman and CEO and our lead independent director act together in a system of checks and balances, providing both strong oversight and operational insight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO, Mr. Moghadam, serves as chairman of the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lead independent director role is focused on ensuring independent oversight of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Moghadams roles as both CEO and chairman enable him to act as a bridge between management and the Board, ensuring that the Board understands our business when making its decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Moghadam has the breadth of experience to execute our unique business plan and provide special insight to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Very few have experience running a public company with extensive global operations and substantial strategic capital and development businesses.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Moghadam co-founded the company and has served on the Board since the companys initial public offering in November 1997.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As one of our founders, Mr. Moghadam has extensive knowledge and expertise in the real estate and REIT industries, as well as history and knowledge of our company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Considering all of these factors, the Board believes that a structure that combines the roles of CEO and chairman, along with an independent lead director, independent chairs for each of the Board committees and independent non-employee directors, provides the best leadership for the company at this time and places the company in a competitive position to provide long-term value to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Lead independent director
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the offices of chairman and CEO are held by the same person, the independent members of the Board will annually elect an independent director to serve in a lead capacity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lead independent director is generally expected to serve for more than one year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Lyons has been selected as the lead independent director by our Governance Committee and the independent members of our Board and has served in that capacity for nearly six years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The lead independent director coordinates the activities of the other independent directors, and performs such other duties and responsibilities as the Board may determine.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The specific responsibilities of the lead independent director are currently as follows:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Sessions/Committee Meetings  Presides at all meetings of the Board at which the chairman is not present, including executive sessions of the independent directors (generally held at every regular board meeting)  Attends meetings of the various Board committees regularly Meetings of Independent Directors  Has the authority to call meetings of the independent directors and set the agenda Board Evaluations  Oversees, with the chair of the Governance Committee, annual evaluations of the Board, Board committees and individual directors, including an evaluation of the chairmans effectiveness as both chairman and CEO Liaison with Chairman and CEO  Serves as liaison between the independent directors and the chairman  Meets regularly between Board meetings with the chairman and CEO Board Processes and Information  Ensures the quality, quantity, appropriateness and timeliness of information provided to the Board and provides input to create meeting agendas  Ensures that feedback is properly communicated to the Board and chairman  Ensures the institution of proper Board processes, including the number, frequency and scheduling of Board meetings and sufficient time for discussion of all agenda items Retention of Outside Advisors and Consultants  Has authority to retain outside advisors and consultants who report directly to the Board Communications with Stockholders  Responds to stockholder inquiries when appropriate, following consultation with the chairman and CEO  Communicates with stockholders when appropriate, following consultation with the chairman and CEO
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the Maryland General Corporation Law and our bylaws, our business, property and affairs are managed under the direction of the Board.

sentences.text: Members of the Board are kept informed of our business through our executive management team.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The four standing committees of the Board are: Audit, Governance, Compensation and Executive Committee (the Executive Committee).

sentences.text: The Board has determined that each member of the Audit, Governance and Compensation Committees is an independent director in accordance with NYSE rules.

sentences.text: Boards role in risk oversight
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Risk awareness is embedded throughout our operations, underpinned by an integrated framework for identifying, assessing and managing risk.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has the primary responsibility for overseeing risk management of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Oversight for certain specific risks falls under the responsibilities of our Board committees.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee focuses on financial and cybersecurity risks relating to the compan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee focuses on risks relating to remuneration of our officers and employees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee focuses on reputational and corporate governance risks and corporate responsibility and sustainability initiatives relating to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These committees regularly advise the full Board of their risk oversight activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Critical components of our risk oversight framework include regular communication among the Board, our management executive committee and our risk management infrastructure to identify, assess and manage risk
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board Oversight Management Executive Committee Oversight Risk Management Infrastructure Dynamic Risk Oversight Process Risk Oversight Framework
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Identifying, Managing and Assessing Risks
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our risk oversight framework includes
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board engagement with executive and risk management teams including risk assessment mapping and one-on-one interviews between each director and our risk management team
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive management committee meetings focused on strategic risks
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A structured approach to capital deployment vetted through weekly investment committee meetings
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management of one of the strongest balance sheets in the REIT industry achieved by lowering our financial risk and foreign currency exposure
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Rigorous internal and third-party audits assessing the companys controls and procedures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Centralized team dedicated to managing risk globally closely engaged with Prologis teams at an individual market level
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO and management succession planning
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is responsible for ensuring that we have a high-performing management team in place.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board, with the assistance of the Compensation Committee, regularly conducts a detailed review of management development and succession planning activities to ensure that top management positions, including the CEO position, can be filled without undue interruption.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such communications will be reviewed and forwarded to the appropriate director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board held five meetings in 2016, including telephonic meetings, and all of the directors attended 75% or more of the aggregate number of Board and applicable committee meetings on which he or she served during 2016 (held during the periods they served).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each director standing for election in 2017 is expected to attend the annual meeting of stockholders, either in person or telephonically, absent cause.

sentences.text: Director compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see Director Compensation and the table titled Directors Compensation for Fiscal Year 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stock ownership guidelines and prohibition on hedging/pledging
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our directors must comply with our stock ownership guidelines which require the director to maintain an ownership level in our common stock equal to five times the annual cash retainer (a total of $550,000 as of December 31, 2016).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares included as owned by directors for purposes of the guidelines include common stock owned, vested or unvested equity awards (restricted stock, restricted stock units, shares and share units deferred under the terms of the Director Deferred Fee Plan or the applicable non-qualified deferred compensation plan, deferred share units and dividend equivalent units) and operating partnership or other partnership units exchangeable or redeemable for common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Until such time as the guidelines are met, we will require directors to retain and hold 50% of any net shares of our common stock issued to our directors under our equity compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, our insider trading policy prohibits our directors and employees from hedging the economic risk of ownership of our common stock and from pledging shares of our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our directors are currently in compliance with the stock ownership guidelines and the prohibition on hedging and pledging our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent compensation consultant
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee directly engages an outside compensation consulting firm, Frederic W. Cook & Co., Inc. (FW Cook) to assist the committee in assessing our compensation programs for our Board, our CEO and other members of executive management.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook reports directly to the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook receives no compensation from the company other than for its work in advising the Compensation Committee and maintains no other economic relationships with the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook interacts directly with members of our management only on matters under the Compensation Committees oversight.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook conducted a comprehensive competitive review of the compensation program for our executive officers and our non-employee directors in 2016, which was used by the Compensation Committee to assist it in making compensation recommendations to the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our CEO makes separate recommendations to the Compensation Committee concerning the form and amount of the compensation of our executive officers (excluding his own compensation).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cook has also assisted the Compensation Committee in evaluating the design of certain outperformance compensation plans implemented in 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annually, the Compensation Committee considers the independence of FW Cook in light of the rules regarding compensation committee advisor independence mandated under the Dodd-Frank Wall Street Reform and Consumer Protection Act (Dodd-Frank Act).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee reviewed factors, facts and circumstances regarding compensation consultant independence, including a letter from FW Cook addressing FW
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cooks and their consulting teams independent status with respect to the following factors:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) other services provided to us by FW Cook;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) fees we pay to FW Cook as a percentage of their total revenues;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) FW Cooks policies and procedures that are designed to prevent conflicts of interest;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) any business or personal relationship between FW Cook or members of their consulting team that serves the Compensation Committee and a member of the Compensation Committee;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (v) any shares of our stock owned by FW Cook or members of their consulting team that serves the Compensation Committee; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (vi) any business or personal relationships between our executive officers and FW Cook or members of their consulting team that serves the Compensation Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: After discussing these factors, facts and circumstances, the Compensation Committee affirmed the independent status of FW Cook and concluded that there are no conflicts of interest with respect to FW Cook.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation Committee interlocks and insider participation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No member of the Compensation Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) was, during the year ended December 31, 2016, or had previously been, an officer or employee of the company or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) had any material interest in a transaction with the company or a business relationship with, or any indebtedness to, the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No interlocking relationships existed during the year ended December 31, 2016, between any member of the Board or the Compensation Committee and an executive officer of the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Code of Ethics and Business Conduct and Governance Guidelines
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has adopted a code of ethics and business conduct that applies to all employees and directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board has formalized policies, procedures and standards of corporate governance that are reflected in our Governance Guidelines.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our Code of Ethics and Business Conduct outlines in great detail the key principles of ethical conduct expected of our employees, officers and directors, including matters related to conflicts of interest, use of company resources, fair dealing and financial reporting and disclosure.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The code establishes formal procedures for reporting illegal or unethical behavior to the companys internal ethics committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These procedures permit employees to report any concerns, including concerns about the companys accounting, internal accounting controls or auditing matters, on a confidential or anonymous basis if desired.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Employees may contact the ethics committee by e-mail, in writing, by web-based report or by calling a toll-free telephone number.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any significant concerns are reported to the Audit Committee in accordance with the code.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Simultaneous Board service
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our governance guidelines require that, if a director serves on three or more public company boards simultaneously, including our Board, a determination is made by our Board as to whether such simultaneous service impairs the ability of such member to effectively serve the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Messrs. Fotiades, Losh, Lyons, OConnor and Zollars and Ms. Garvey currently serve on at least three public company boards, including our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In each case, our Board has determined that such simultaneous board service does not impair the Board members ability to be an effective member of our Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of our directors currently serve on more than four public company boards (including our Board).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Certain relationships and related party transactions
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We do not have any related party transactions to report under relevant SEC rules and regulations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: According to our Articles of Incorporation, the Board may authorize any agreement or other transaction with any party even
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: though one or more of our directors or officers may be a party to such an agreement or is an officer, director, stockholder, member or partner of the other party if:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the existence of the relationship is disclosed or known to the Board, and the contract or transaction is authorized, approved or ratified by the affirmative vote of not less than a majority of the disinterested directors, even if they constitute less than a quorum of the Board;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the existence is disclosed to the stockholders entitled to vote, and the contract or transaction is authorized, approved or ratified by a majority of the votes cast by the stockholders entitled to vote (excluding shares owned by any interested director or officer or the organization in which such person is a director or has a material financial interest); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the contract or transaction is fair and reasonable to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We recognize that transactions between us and related parties can present potential or actual conflicts of interest and create the appearance that our decisions are based on considerations other than the companys best interests and the best interests of our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Related parties may include our directors, executives, significant stockholders and immediate family members and affiliates of such persons.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, several provisions of our code of ethics and business conduct are intended to help us avoid the conflicts and other issues that may arise in transactions between us and related parties, prescribing that:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: employees will not engage in conduct or activity that may raise questions as to the companys honesty, impartiality or reputation or otherwise cause embarrassment to the company;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: employees shall not hold financial interests that conflict with, or leave the appearance of conflicting with, the performance of their assigned duties;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: employees shall act impartially and not give undue preferential treatment to any private organization or individual; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: employees should avoid actual conflicts or the appearance of conflicts of interest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These provisions of our code of ethics and business conduct may be amended, modified or waived by the Board or the Governance Committee, subject to the disclosure requirements and other provisions of the rules and regulations of the SEC and the NYSE.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No waivers of our code of ethics and business conduct were granted in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Although we do not have detailed written procedures concerning the waiver of the application of our code of ethics and business conduct or the review and approval of transactions with directors or their affiliates, our directors would consider all relevant facts and circumstances in considering any such waiver or review and approval.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sustainability: environmental stewardship, social responsibility and governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As an environmental, social responsibility and governance (ESG) leader in our industry, we are committed to minimizing the environmental impact of our operations and development activity in ways that create value for our stockholders, our customers and the communities in which we operate.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we received accolades in third-party reports and rankings as a top corporation in ESG not only among REITs but across corporations worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Among other commendations, we were recognized as:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: One of the Global 100 Most Sustainable Corporations in the World for the ninth consecutive yea
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Green Street Advisors REIT Industrys Corporate Governance Leader for the 14th consecutive year; an
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: NAREITs Industrial Leader in the Light in sustainability for the fifth consecutive year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have incorporated sustainability and social responsibility into our long-term strategy as follows
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Sustainability is strategic
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Focusing on environmental and social sustainability is not only the right thing to do, it is the smart thing to do.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our goal is to be the provider of choice for energy efficient and sustainable logistics space worldwide.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Board of Directors and Corporate Governance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our focus on our customers demands a focus on sustainability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model pivots around what our customers want.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This is our competitive advantage.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our customers around the world want sustainable logistics space, so we provide it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For example, our customers are seeking energy efficiency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As such, we adopted an efficient LED lighting program covering approximately 78% of our operating portfolio and have extended solar capacity across our portfolio in nine countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We develop modern facilities, and retrofit existing ones, in line with recognized design standards, such as LEED in the United States, BREEAM in Europe and CASBEE in Japan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have obtained sustainable building certifications for 87 million square feet of space in 231 projects in 15 countries and International Organization for Standardization (ISO) certifications that hold us to standards regarding the environmental impact of our U.S. and European development practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our commitment to sustainability extends to social responsibility
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Being a leader in our industry means more to us than just being top in our field.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It means that we need to set a good example for the rest.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have established a foundation to actively support our communities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This foundation promotes a number of charitable contribution programs, such as our program to match employee and director donations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Reflecting our commitment to our communities, our employees worldwide participate in our annual IMPACT day, volunteering at local schools and non-profits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we sponsored over 10,000 employee volunteer hours and donated approximately 567,000 square feet of logistics space to various charitable organizations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We communicate our approach to sustainability to hold ourselves accountable
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We designed our sustainability program around the Global Reporting Initiatives (GRI) guidelines to communicate how we are performing against our goals, releasing GRI reports annually.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our participation in the GRESB assessment process resulted in the award of nine Green Stars (their highest distinction for excellence in environmental stewardship, social responsibility and governance).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, we independently verify our corporate carbon footprint and report it to the Carbon Disclosure Project and track our energy usage for the ULI Greenprint Center for Building Performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Officers
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: EXECUTIVE OFFICERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Biographies of our executive officers as of December 31, 2016, other than Mr. Moghadam, are presented below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Information for Mr. Moghadam is included above under Board of Directors and Corporate Governance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of our executive officers are named executive officers (each an NEO).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Thomas S. Olinger: Chief Financial Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Olinger, 50, has been our chief financial officer since May 2012 and was our chief integration officer from June 2011 to May 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Olinger was the chief financial officer of AMB from March 2007 to June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining AMB in February 2007, Mr. Olinger was the vice president and corporate controller at Oracle Corporation, an enterprise software company and provider of computer hardware products and services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to his employment with Oracle, Mr. Olinger was an accountant and partner at Arthur Andersen LLP, where he served as the lead partner on our account from 1999 to 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since January 2011, Mr. Olinger has served as a director of American Assets Trust, a real estate investment trust investing in retail, office and residential properties.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Olinger holds a Bachelor of Science degree in finance from the Kelley School of Business at Indiana University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eugene F. Reilly: CEO, The Americas
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Reilly, 55, has been CEO, the Americas, since the Merger in June 2011, and he served as president, the Americas, as well as a number of other executive positions, at AMB from October 2003 until the Merger in June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Reilly serves on the technical committee of FIBRA Prologis, a publicly traded Mexican REIT that is sponsored and managed by the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining AMB in October 2003, Mr. Reilly was chief investment officer of Cabot Properties, Inc., a private equity industrial real estate firm of which he was also a founding partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: From August 2009 until December 2015, Mr. Reilly served as a director of Strategic Hotels and Resorts, an owner and asset manager of high-end hotels and resorts.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Reilly holds an A.B. degree in economics from Harvard College.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Edward S. Nekritz: Chief Legal Officer, General Counsel and Secretary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nekritz, 51, has been our chief legal officer, general counsel and secretary since the Merger in June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nekritz was general counsel of the Trust from December 1998 to June 2011 and secretary of the Trust from March 1999 to June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nekritz serves on the technical committee of FIBRA Prologis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining the Trust in September 1995, Mr. Nekritz was an attorney with Mayer, Brown & Platt (now Mayer Brown LLP).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Nekritz holds a Juris Doctor degree from the University of Chicago Law School and an A.B. degree in government from Harvard College.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gary E. Anderson: CEO, Europe and Asia
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson, 51 has been our CEO, Europe and Asia, since the Merger in June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson held various positions with the Trust from August 1994 to June 2011, including head of the Trusts global fund business from March 2009 to June 2011 and president of the Trusts European operations, from November 2006 to March 2009.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to joining the Trust, Mr. Anderson held various positions with Security Capital Group Incorporated, a diversified real estate investment company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Anderson holds a Master of Business Administration in finance and real estate from the Anderson Graduate School of Management at the University of California at Los Angeles and a Bachelor of Arts in marketing from Washington State University.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Michael S. Curless: Chief Investment Officer
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Curless, 53, has been our chief investment officer since the Merger in June 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Curless was chief investment officer of the Trust from September 2010 to June 2011, and he was with the Trust in various capacities from August 1995 through February 2000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Curless was president and a principal at Lauth, a privately-held national construction and development firm, from March 2000 until rejoining the Trust in September 2010.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior thereto, he was a marketing director with the Trammell Crow Company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Curless holds a Master of Business Administration in finance and marketing and a Bachelor of Science in finance from the Kelley School of Business at Indiana University.

sentences.text: Executive Summary
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 was a year of significant accomplishment at Prologis, reflecting solid execution by our team and outperformance in the equity markets.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Results were ahead of most of our performance targets as we concluded our three-year strategic plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We achieved net earnings of $2.27 per share and Core FFO(1) of $2.57 per share, representing an increase of 38% and 15%, respectively, over 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our three-year compound annual growth rate for net earnings and Core FFO per share was 53% and 16%, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annualized three-year TSR outperformed the Cohen & Steers REIT Index by 210 basis points and the MSCI REIT Index by 340 basis points.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We now have one of the top balance sheets in our sector.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our credit rating upgrades to A3 and A- by Moodys and S&P, respectively, are an acknowledgement of our prudent financial management and balance sheet strength.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These upgrades mark the achievement of one of our primary long-term goals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue our focus on industry-leading governance and responsible compensation practices, assessing and strengthening our programs in response to stockholder feedback.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we adopted proxy access and amended our Prologis Outperformance Plan (POP) to make its performance hurdles even more challenging.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: 2016 key points
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are uniquely positioned to meet the evolving logistics needs of our customers across four continents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have approximately $66.0 billion in AUM across 20 countries with a substantial strategic capital business and development program essential to our business model.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our portfolio is concentrated in major population centers critical to our customers logistics strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model is a strategic advantage that delivers durable and sustainable growth.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program supports our business model.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation is based on performance measured against our operational goals and the TSR indices important to our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation reflects the level of our performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As demonstrated in 2015, if we do not meet established performance metrics, our compensation (largely formulaic in determination) will reflect our underperformance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If we outperform, as we did in 2016, our compensation will reflect our outperformance according to plan formulas.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our focus on our customers is a competitive advantage
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are where our customers need us to be.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our customers are multinational companies with logistics needs that span four continents.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Eighteen out of our top 20 customers lease from us in multiple countries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The combination of our worldwide reach, significant development platform and size and scope of our strategic capital business puts us in a unique category among REITs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategic capital partners provide capital that enables us to own and manage properties in locations vital to our customers.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Through our development business, we build the modern facilities in the right locations our customers need.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Durable and sustainable growth and value over the long term
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We deliver long-term growth and value for our stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Not only did we outperform the Cohen & Steers REIT and MSCI REIT Indices in three-year TSR, but our common stock price and dividends have grown by 45% and 50%, respectively, in the last five years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also outperformed operationally in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition to 38% growth in net earnings per share and 15% growth in Core FFO per share, our owned and managed portfolio was 96.2% occupied on average and its rent change on rollover grew by 13.8% in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Incentive-based to achieve strong operational and TSR performance for our stockholders
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation program supports our business
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual bonus program rewards successful execution of our strategic priorities
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our long-term incentive equity awards represent a significant component of annual compensation and reward relative three-year TSR performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our nondiscretionary outperformance compensation plans complete the total pay opportunity for our NEOs but only deliver compensation when exceptional levels of performance are reached.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These plans extend far beyond the NEOs to incentivize about 100 participants in total.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No payments were earned under our outperformance plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In 2016, we outperformed substantially both from an operational and TSR standpoint, resulting in above-target bonuses, target annual equity awards and payments under our outperformance plans.

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model drives durable and sustainable long-term growth
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our operations demonstrate continued strength
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We continue to demonstrate strength in our operations, reporting average occupancy across our owned and managed portfolio of 96.2% in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Strategic capital fee streams add to our bottom line.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our strategic capital ventures pay us regular management fees to manage the assets in the ventures portfolios.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In some ventures, we also receive special incentive fees called promotes if we produce returns on the ventures investments over certain hurdles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These hurdles, different for each venture, are all set at high levels so that, if met, the venture investors achieve significant returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Not only do our venture investors benefit when we meet promote hurdles, our stockholders reap the rewards too.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The promotes we earn, in addition to the recurring management fee streams, boost our earnings and cash flows benefitting our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Third-party share of asset management fees(1) and net promotes(2) from our strategic capital ventures has grown by 193% over the last five years.

sentences.text: Our development business creates significant value.

sentences.text: Developing well-located land into income-generating logistics facilities unlocks the asset value potential in raw assets.

sentences.text: Smart management of risk protects long-term stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our credit ratings were upgraded from Baa1/BBB+ to A3/A- by Moodys and S&P, respectively, in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have worked hard to improve our credit metrics.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are now one of the top credit-rated REITs in our industry, with over $4.0 billion in liquidity at year-end 2016.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our business model delivers long-term growth both on a relative and absolute basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The three-year compound annual growth rate of our net earnings per share was 53% versus that of our domestic industrial REIT comparison group (East Group Properties, First Industrial, DCT Industrial and Duke Realty) averaging 43%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Since 2012, our annual net earnings per share have grown by 1361%, Core FFO per share by 48% and our common stock dividends by 50%.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We delivered this growth while also substantially deleveraging to improve our balance sheet and building significant liquidity.

sentences.text: 2016 Compensation Highlights
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our compensation is aligned with long-term relative TSR and operational performance
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Base salaries
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We did not increase the base salaries of our NEOs in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Bonuses
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our performance in 2016 was exceptional, as discussed above.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the Compensation Committees assessment of our performance against the annual bonus metrics outlined on the following page, our NEOs earned bonuses ranging from 148% to 154% of target.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Long-term incentive awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our relative annualized three-year TSR at the end of 2016 outperformed the Cohen & Steers REIT Index by 210 basis points and the MSCI REIT Index by 340 basis points.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Performance indices used in our long-term incentive programs are indices important to our stockholders to assess our relative TSR performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our annual long-term incentive (LTI) equity award and outperformance programs each employ different indices to represent the full picture of how our performance is measured by our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual LTI equity awards
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual LTI equity awards represent the largest portion, approximately 58% to 77%, of total target core compensation (annual base salary, annual bonus and annual LTI equity awards).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Target annual LTI equity awards are generally set at levels such that total target core compensation is within a reasonable range of the median of our comparison group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Pursuant to the formula used to determine annual LTI grant values, which uses the Cohen & Steers REIT Index and the global and domestic REIT comparison groups, each of our NEOs were granted 100% of their target grant value in 2017 for the prior three years performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Outperformance compensation plans (POP and Prologis Promote Plan (PPP))
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our outperformance compensation plans pay out only when strenuous formulaic performance hurdles are achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: POP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: About 100 participants receive an annual opportunity to earn awards under POP but only if high-reach three-year relative TSR hurdles are met.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A POP compensation pool only funds if and to the extent our three-year compound annualized TSR exceeds the three-year MSCI REIT Index annual return by 100 basis points.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2012-2014 and 2013-2015 performance cycles, POP did not pay out because the high-reach MSCI REIT Index hurdles were not achieved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we achieve the high-reach hurdle, our stockholders benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For the 2014-2016 performance cycle, we surpassed the high-reach three-year relative TSR hurdle, resulting in a total payout of $28.0 million to the NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate payout to the NEOs was 1.0% of the $2.8 billion in stockholder value created above index performance, over the three-year performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The calculation of our outperformance during the 2014-2016 performance cycle uses a market capitalization for Prologis of $18.7 billion at the beginning of the three-year performance period and $28.3 billion at the end of such period, representing a 51% increase in our market capitalization.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PPP
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also exceeded the difficult promote hurdles for three of our ventures, resulting in payments of PPP awards in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: PPP awards are earned when Prologis meets certain hurdles to earn a promote from an applicable venture.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The promote thresholds relating to PPP awards are certain investment rates of return in excess of compound annualized returns.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The promote hurdles are formulaic and difficult to achieve.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Promotes are negotiated at arms length with third- party investors whose interest is to set the hurdles at superior levels to warrant a payout of incentive fees to the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we achieve the hurdles, the venture investors receive outsized returns on their investment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: When we meet the difficult promote hurdles, our stockholders reap the benefits too.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of achieving the promote hurdles in three of our ventures (for which PPP awards were paid in 2016), $866.4 million in value was created for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The $866.4 million in value creation captures the promotes paid to Prologis and the increase in net asset value of Prologis investment in the applicable ventures created by achieving the hurdles, plus management fees paid to Prologis by the ventures during the incentive periods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This amount does not include the portion of management fees attributable to our ownership share of the ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also excludes equity transactions that, while impacting net asset value, did not create value for the ventures, such as capital contributions and returns of capital.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result of exceeding the promote hurdles, a portion of such promotes were paid as PPP awards to about 100 participants in total.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: $10.3 million in total PPP awards were awarded to the NEOs in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These PPP awards were, in aggregate, only 1.2% of the $866.4 million of increased value created for our stockholders in achieving the promote hurdles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) We calculate our outperformance by comparing the aggregate dollar value of our actual TSR versus the aggregate value of our TSR had it tracked the growth of the MSCI REIT Index over the same period of time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The aggregate dollar value of our TSR is generally the sum of
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the increase in value of existing and newly issued shares, plus
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) cumulative dividends including reinvestment.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please see POP for further detail regarding the outperformance calculation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prologis aggregate TSR over 2014-2016 was $11.0 billion vs. $8.2 billion had our stock performance matched the performance of the index.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This calculation uses a market capitalization for Prologis of $18.7 billion at the beginning of the three-year period and $28.3 billion at the end of such period, a 51% increase.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO PPP awards are a small fraction (0.4%) of the aggregate $866.4 million in value generated for our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As discussed above, our stockholders and venture investors benefit when we exceed the strenuous promote hurdles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Surpassing these promote hurdles means that we increased the net asset value of the applicable ventures to outsized levels, providing superior returns to our venture investors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our stockholders realized $866.4 million in aggregate value created over the relevant measurement periods, which represents Prologis ownership share of the growth of net asset value of the three ventures, the management fees paid to Prologis during the measurement periods and the promotes paid to Prologis in achieving the hurdles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Due to exceeding the promote hurdles and earning the promotes for Prologis, $3.4 million in aggregate PPP awards were paid to our CEO in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These PPP awards were only 0.4% of the $866.4 million in total value created for our stockholders in achieving the strenuous promote hurdles.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: $0M $3.4 Million CEO PPP Awards(2) $1B Total Value Created for Stockholders  in Achieving Promote Hurdles $866.4 Million CEO PPP Awards for 2016 vs. Total Value Created for Stockholders in Achieving Promote Hurdles(1)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: CEO PPP awards are
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: of the total value created in  achieving the promote hurdles
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) The total value created in achieving the promote hurdles is calculated by determining our ownership share of the growth in net asset value during the incentive period, gross of any promote accrual for the applicable ventures, adding in management fees paid by such ventures to Prologis during the same period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The total value created in exceeding the promote hurdles excludes equity transactions that, while impacting net asset value, did not create value for the fund, such as capital contributions, returns of capital, etc.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: It also excludes Prologis ownership share of management fees paid to Prologis by the ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The promotes relevant to this calculation were the promotes related to the PPP awards paid in 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) CEO PPP awards paid in 2016.
