sentences.text: 2012 NQDC Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Effective 2012, we established a nonqualified deferred compensation plan (the 2012 NQDC Plan).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2012 NQDC Plan allows certain eligible employees and non-employee directors of the company and our participating subsidiaries to elect to defer up to 100% of their eligible compensation, such as annual salary, bonus, equity awards and directors fees, that were earned and vested on or after January 1, 2012.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deferred compensation under the 2012 NQDC Plan is our unsecured obligation and amounts deferred are held in a rabbi trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants select from various investment options available under the plan to earn investment credits on their elective deferrals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no guaranteed returns for any of the investment options or for any participants in the plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of earnings that a participant receives depends on the participants investment elections related to cash balances in the account and, with respect to shares of our common stock that have been deferred, the
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: dividends earned on that stock and the change in market value of the stock during the period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The 2012 NQDC Plan offers a variety of investment choices with respect to cash contributions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our common stock is not an investment option available with respect to deferrals of cash compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The NEOs did not elect to defer any of their 2016 cash compensation (salary or bonus) under the 2012 NQDC Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a participant elects to defer the receipt of an equity award, the underlying common stock is held in the rabbi trust, which cannot be reinvested in any other investment option.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash dividends earned on these shares of our common stock after deferral are credited with earnings and losses based on specific investment options, other than our common stock, that are selected by the participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distributions under these plans are made in a lump sum payment upon termination of employment, or service as a non-employee director, or in the event of a change in control or death of a participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: With respect to equity awards deferred by non-employee directors, participants may elect to receive distributions prior to termination of service.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have reserved the right under the 2012 NQDC Plan to make discretionary matching contributions to participant accounts from time to time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No such discretionary contributions have been made.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The participants elective deferrals and matching contributions, if any, are fully vested at all times.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We pay all of the administrative costs associated with the 2012 NQDC Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Generally, the compensation that is deferred is tax-deferred until it is distributed to the participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, amounts deferred are subject to FICA and Medicare employee and employer taxes in accordance with statutory requirements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2014, the 2012 NQDC Plan was amended, primarily to allow for LTIP Units to be issued in lieu of other deferred compensation upon a distribution event.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AMB NQ Plans
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Prior to the Merger in 2011, we maintained two nonqualified deferred compensation plans:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the Amended and Restated AMB 2005 Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Plan (the 2005 NQ Plan) and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the Amended and Restated Nonqualified Deferred Compensation Plan (the 2002 NQ Plan), (together, the AMB NQ Plans).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The AMB NQ Plans allowed our directors and certain eligible employees to defer certain compensation, including the receipt of restricted stock awards and, in the case of the 2002 NQ Plan, gains from exercise of stock options, received under our equity compensation plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The AMB NQ Plans provided that upon a change in control, such as the Merger in June 2011, participants would receive a lump-sum payment equal to the vested account balance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such distributions were made in 2011.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Compensation subject to deferral elections made under the AMB NQ Plans prior to the Merger with respect to compensation earned in 2011 and beyond was not subject to the distributions under the AMB NQ Plans triggered by the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Moghadam has deferred certain gains resulting from the exercise of stock options under the 2002 NQ Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, Mr. Moghadam and Mr. Olinger have deferred shares of our common stock received upon vesting of certain equity awards under the 2005 NQ Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The deferred compensation under the AMB NQ Plans is our unsecured obligation and amounts deferred are held in a rabbi trust.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants select from various investment options available under the plans to receive investment credit on their elective deferrals.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There are no guaranteed returns for any of the investment options or for any participants in the plans.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The amount of earnings that a participant receives depends on the participants investment elections related to cash balances in the account and, with respect to deferred shares of our common stock, the dividends earned on the stock and the change in market value of the stock during the period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Cash dividends earned on shares of our common stock after deferral are credited earnings and losses based on specific investment options, other than our common stock, selected by the participant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distributions under these plans are made in either a lump sum payment or installments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Participants can elect a specific distribution date in accordance with Section 409A of the Internal Revenue Code or, if no election is made, the amounts will be distributed upon termination of the participants employment with us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distributions are also made in the event of change in control or a participants death or disability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In December 2014, the 2005 NQ Plan was amended, primarily to allow for LTIP Units to be issued in lieu of other deferred compensation upon a distribution event under the plan.

sentences.text: Notional Account NQDC Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notional Account NQDC Plan was adopted in conjunction with the Merger in 2011 with the purpose of providing the opportunity for certain participants of the AMB NQ Plans to continue to receive tax deferred earnings with respect to taxes on distributions triggered by the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each participant in the AMB NQ Plans who continued to be employed by us after the Merger or continued as a non-employee director after the Merger received an initial account credit in a notional earnings account under the Notional Account NQDC Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Mr. Moghadam and Mr. Olinger participate in the Notional Account NQDC Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The initial account credit value for a participant was equal to the deemed amount of the tax liability on the distributions they received in 2011 that were triggered by the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The initial account credit value is either invested in our common stock or hypothetically invested in measurement funds selected by the participant, which do not include our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Measurement funds are used for measurement purposes only and plan participants do not have rights in or to the underlying hypothetical investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A notional earnings account is credited with hypothetical earnings or charged with hypothetical losses associated with the underlying hypothetical investments in measurement funds.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon a distribution event under the plan, the participant is entitled to the excess, if any, of the value in the notional earnings account (representing the value of the initial account credit plus cumulative earnings or losses associated with the underlying hypothetical investments, if any) over the initial account credit value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Potential Payments upon Termination or Change in Control
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have change in control and noncompetition agreements (the CIC Agreements) with our NEOs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The CIC Agreements are subject to automatic one-year extensions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Some form of severance benefits (cash payments and/ or acceleration of vesting of unvested equity awards) are provided to our NEOs for:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) in the CIC Agreements;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) under the equity award agreements; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) under the terms of POP under the following scenarios:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: death
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: disability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: retirement (as defined and under certain circumstances)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: termination without cause or termination by employee for good reason within two years of a change in control (as defined)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a change in control, the CIC Agreements provide for severance benefits on a double-trigger basis with severance benefits payable only upon termination of employment (which is, generally, termination without cause or termination by employee for good reason as such term is defined in the CIC Agreements), within two years following the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the CIC Agreements, in consideration for the rights to receive such severance payments, the NEO is subject to confidentiality obligations during employment and after termination, non-competition obligations during the term of employment and non-solicitation obligations for two years after the date of termination.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A change of control, as defined in the CIC Agreements, generally occurs upon:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the consummation of a transaction, approved by our stockholders, to merge or consolidate the company with another entity, sell or otherwise dispose of all or substantially all of its assets or adopt a plan of liquidation, provided, however, that a change in control shall not occur if a transaction results in 50% or more of the beneficial ownership of the voting power of the company or other relevant entity being held by the same persons (although not necessarily in the same proportion) who held the voting power of the company immediately prior to the transaction (except that upon the completion of the transaction, employees or employee benefit plans of the company may be a new holder of such beneficial ownership);
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the beneficial ownership of securities representing 50% or more of the combined voting power of the company is acquired, other than from the company, by any person (with certain exceptions); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) at any time during any period of two consecutive years, board members at the beginning of such period cease to constitute at least a majority of the board (unless the election or the nomination for election of each new director was approved by a vote of at least two-thirds of the directors still in office at the time of such election or nomination who were directors at the beginning of such period).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Potential payments due to the NEOs under the scenarios listed above are presented in the table below based on the assumption that a termination occurred as of December 31, 2016.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, these payments are not considered to be severance benefits and such amounts are not included in the amounts presented.

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Cause is generally defined in the CIC Agreements as:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) the willful and continued failure by the executive to substantially perform specified duties;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the engaging in conduct that is demonstrably injurious to the company (monetarily or otherwise); or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) the engaging in egregious misconduct involving serious moral turpitude.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Termination by employee for good reason, as generally defined in the CIC Agreements, can occur should we:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) change the executives duties such that they are inconsistent with the position held prior to the change in control and results in a material diminution in the executives authority, duties, or responsibilities;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) material reduction in the executives annual base compensation after the change in control;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) relocate the executives place of employment more than 50 miles from the current location or require the executive to be based anywhere other than where the executive was based prior to the change in control without the executives written consent resulting in a material change to geographic location; or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iv) not comply with the provisions of the agreements or arrangements pertaining to the officers compensation and benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (2) Under the death and disability scenarios contained in the CIC Agreements, the NEO would receive a cash severance payment equal to his annual base salary plus the annual bonus amount that he received or was entitled to receive for the most recent annual period (target level for 2016) less amounts that would be paid to the executive from other company benefits.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The starting amount under each scenario ($2,500,000 for Mr. Moghadam and $1,350,000 for each of the other NEOs) is based on the executives annual base salary as of December 31, 2016 ($1,000,000 for Mr. Moghadam and $600,000 for each of the other NEOs) and the executives annual bonus at target for 2016 ($1,500,000 for Mr. Moghadam and $750,000 for each of the other NEOs).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the death scenario, each executives severance payment has been reduced by $1,000,000, which is the approximate present value of the life insurance benefit provided by the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The life insurance benefit provided by the company is two times base salary with a limit of $1,000,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the disability scenario, the starting amount is the same as under the death scenario and each executives severance payment has been reduced to zero based on the expected present value of future disability benefits that the executive would receive that are provided and funded by the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual disability benefit provided by the company is 60% of base salary subject to a maximum of $204,000 per year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this purpose, it is assumed that the present value of the future annual disability benefits to be received will be in excess of the payments required under the CIC Agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the change in control scenario, the NEO would receive cash severance equal to two times his annual base salary and two times his annual bonus (at target) for the current year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) In the change in control scenario contained in the CIC Agreements, the NEO would receive a cash payment equal to the cost of continuation of health insurance coverage in place at the date of termination for 24 months.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, the CIC Agreements provide for the payment of an amount equal to two times the companys matching contribution under the 401(k) Plan ($16,200) and for outplacement services for one year with an estimated value of $25,000.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (4) The CIC Agreements provide for the reduction of any payments to which the NEO is entitled after a change in control should such payments constitute a parachute payment (as defined in Section 280G of the Internal Revenue Code).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such payments shall be either
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (a) reduced (but not below zero) so that the aggregate present value of the payment shall be $1.00 less than three times the officers base amount (also as defined in Section 280G of the Internal Revenue Code) so that no portion of the payment will be subject to the excise tax imposed by Section 4999 of the Internal Revenue Code or
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (b) paid in full, whichever produces the better net after-tax result for the NEO (taking into account any applicable excise tax under Section 4999 and any applicable income taxes).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the scenarios for 2016, none of the NEOs, except Mr. Moghadam, would receive a better net after-tax result with a reduction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (5) The estimates for each scenario reflect the value that would be realized as of December 31, 2016 as a result of accelerated vesting of earned but unvested stock awards, LTIP Units and participation points (or POP LTIP Units) awarded under the POP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Values are included to the extent that vesting would be accelerated under the applicable scenario under the terms of the applicable agreements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stock options held by the NEOs are vested so no additional value is realized under any scenario related to stock options.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For each scenario, the value attributable to stock awards is computed based on the closing price of our common stock on December 31, 2016 ($52.79).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the death and disability scenarios, awards under POP would not be paid until the end of the performance period and the actual awards paid would be based on performance for the entire performance period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these scenarios, the value of the participation points allocated to each NEO under POP (and the POP LTIP Units exchanged for such participation points) for the 2015-2017 Performance Period and the 2016-2018 Performance Period is computed as of December 31, 2016 using estimated compensation pools based on actual performance for the performance period through December 31, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, the estimated value of the aggregate compensation pool for these performance periods is $109.7 million for the 2015  2017 Performance Period and $109.7 million for the 2016  2018 Performance Period.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the change in control scenario, the Compensation Committee would determine the size of the compensation pool for each performance period and cash awards would be paid as of the executives termination date due to the change in control.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under this scenario, the value of the participation points allocated to each NEO under POP (and the POP LTIP Units exchanged for such participation points) for the 2015-2017 Performance Period and the 2016-2018 Performance Periods is computed consistently with the value applicable to the death and disability scenarios.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The POP awards earned for the 2014-2016 Performance Period were not included in the death, disability and change in control calculations as participants were eligible to earn their awards (pending approval by the Compensation Committee) as of December 31, 2016 and, as such, the awards would not be considered a death, disability or severance benefit.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (6) The 2012 LTIP provides for acceleration of vesting of unvested stock awards and stock options upon retirement, defined as attaining 62 years of age with a combined sum of age and years of service equal to or exceeding 75.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The POP allows participants to retain their participation points upon retirement using the 2012 LTIP definition of retirement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: None of the NEOs met the retirement eligibility criteria as of December 31, 2016, the assumed date of the termination scenarios for this presentation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, no acceleration benefit is reported for a retirement scenario.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote to Approve the Companys Executive Compensation for 2016 (Proposal 2)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Dodd-Frank Act allows our stockholders to vote to approve, on an advisory (non-binding) basis, the compensation of our NEOs as disclosed in this proxy statement in accordance with SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The compensation of our NEOs is discussed above under Executive Compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our executive compensation programs are designed to attract, motivate and retain our NEOs, who are critical to our success.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under these programs, our NEOs are rewarded for the achievement of specific annual, long-term and strategic goals and the realization of increased stockholder value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please read CD&A for additional details about our executive compensation programs, including information about the compensation of our NEOs for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proposal, commonly known as a say-on-pay proposal, gives our stockholders the opportunity to express their views on our NEOs compensation that is described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This vote is not intended to address any specific item of compensation, but rather the overall compensation of our NEOs and the philosophy, policies and practices described in this proxy statement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we ask our stockholders to vote FOR the following resolution at the annual meeting:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: RESOLVED, that the companys stockholders approve, on an advisory basis, the companys 2016 executive compensation, as discussed and disclosed in the companys proxy statement for the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders pursuant to the compensation disclosure rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission, including the Compensation Discussion and Analysis, the Executive Compensation Tables and related narratives.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote for, vote against or abstain from voting to approve the above resolution on the companys executive compensation for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming a quorum is present, to be approved by the stockholders, the proposal must receive the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of common stock having voting power present in person or by proxy at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are considered voting power present in person or by proxy and thus will have the same effect as votes cast Against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As an advisory vote, this proposal is not binding on the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Compensation Committee values the opinions of our stockholders and will review and consider the voting results when making future executive compensation decisions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The company currently intends to hold an advisory vote on its executive compensation on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that the stockholders vote, on an advisory basis, FOR the approval of our 2016 executive compensation, as disclosed in this proxy statement pursuant to the compensation disclosure rules of the Securities and Exchange Commission.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Advisory Vote on the Frequency of Future Advisory Votes on the Companys Executive Compensation (Proposal 3)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As required by Section 14A of the Exchange Act, stockholders may cast a non-binding vote on how often we should include an advisory vote on executive compensation in our proxy materials for future annual or other meetings for which we must include executive compensation information.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may vote to have the advisory vote on executive compensation every year, every two years or every three years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may also abstain from voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board believes that these votes should occur every year, if our stockholders so choose.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will be able to specify, through your vote, one of four choices on your proxy card: one year, two years, three years or abstain.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The non-binding vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation will be the frequency receiving the greatest number of votes at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes, if any, will have no effect on the outcome of the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Executive Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As an advisory vote, this proposal is not binding on the company.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, the Board values input from our stockholders and will consider the outcome of the vote when making a determination on the frequency of future advisory votes on executive compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that the stockholders vote, on an advisory basis, FOR future stockholder advisory votes on executive compensation to be held ANNUALLY.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: DIRECTOR COMPENSATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Director Compensation
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-employee directors are compensated with a mix of cash and equity-based compensation, with a higher percentage of the overall mix in equity-based compensation.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An employee who also serves as a member of the Board, such as Mr. Moghadam, does not receive additional compensation for service on the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In May 2016, FW Cook conducted a competitive review of our non-employee director compensation to ensure that our compensation levels are competitive and the structure of the program is consistent with corporate governance best practices.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Compensation Committee has targeted our non-employee director compensation at the 75th percentile of the S&P 500, but not to exceed the 90th percentile of a comparison group of 10 large-cap REITs.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These REITs are the same companies that are in the comparison group that is used to evaluate executive compensation and are listed above under Compensation Discussion and AnalysisDiscussion of Compensation Comparison Group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The targeted percentiles are reflective of our overall size, scope and breadth of business, which approximates the 75th percentile of the S&P 500 and exceeds that of most of the companies in the comparison group.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: FW Cooks review found that
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) our non-employee director compensation was near the 75th percentile of the comparison group but was below the median of the S&P 500, assuming a 5% increase from 2015 compensation levels for the comparison group and the S&P 500 and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) the mix between the cash and equity components of our non-employee director compensation (40% in cash and 60% in equity) was consistent with median competitive practice of both the comparison group and the S&P 500.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To maintain our desired competitive positioning (at 75th percentile of S&P 500, not to exceed the 90th percentile of the comparison group), FW Cook recommended an increase to our non-employee director annual compensation of $25,000 per director, with a $10,000 increase to the cash retainer and $15,000 increase to the annual equity grant.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: No changes to the retainers paid to the lead independent director and the committee chairs were recommended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The recommendations were approved by the full Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The change in the equity component was effective with the annual grants made in May 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The change in the cash retainers was effective July 1, 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annual equity awards: Valued on the grant date at $165,000 (increased from $150,000)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the form of deferred share units (DSUs), each convertible into one share of our common stock, that will vest upon the earlier of one year from the grant date or the date of the next annual meeting.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notional Account NQDC Plan
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Notional Account NQDC Plan, Mr. Losh and Ms. Kennard received an initial account credit value in a notional earnings account equal to the amount of the deemed tax liability on the distributions they received in 2011 triggered by the Merger.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The initial account credit value is hypothetically invested in measurement funds selected by the participant, which do not include our company stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Measurement funds are used for measurement purposes only and plan participants do not have rights in or to the underlying hypothetical investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notional earnings accounts are credited with hypothetical earnings or charged with hypothetical losses associated with the underlying hypothetical investments.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon their retirement from the Board, Mr. Losh and Ms. Kennard are entitled to the excess, if any, of the value in their notional earnings account (representing the value of the initial account credit plus cumulative earnings or losses associated with the underlying hypothetical investments, if any) over their initial account credit value.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The initial account credit values for Mr. Losh and Ms. Kennard were $469,558 and $98,047, respectively.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of December 31, 2016, the value of the notional earnings account exceeded the initial account credit value for Mr. Losh by $303,944, including an increase attributable to 2016 of $59,709, and for Ms. Kennard by $9,908, including an increase attributable to 2016 of $5,158.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: See discussion of our deferred compensation plans in the narrative that follow the Nonqualified Deferred Compensation in Fiscal Year 2016 table above under Executive Compensation.

sentences.text: ProLogis Deferred Fee Plan for Trustees
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This plan, which was assumed by us in the Merger, allowed members of the Trusts board to receive their fees currently or elect to defer the receipt of their fees until after their board service ended.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Deferrals were in the form of cash or Trust common shares.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For those choosing shares, fees earned were credited to hypothetical fee deferral accounts based on the closing price of the common shares as of the date of the deferral.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under the Merger agreement, the Trust common shares in the deferral account were converted to our common stock using the Merger exchange ratio.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each share in the hypothetical account represents one share of our common stock and earns dividends under the same terms as dividends paid on our common stock.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Upon retirement from the Board,
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: AUDIT MATTERS
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee Report
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The purpose of the Audit Committee is to be an informed, vigilant and effective overseer of our financial accounting and reporting processes consistent with risk mitigation appropriate in the circumstances.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation and oversight of our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee is comprised of the three directors named below.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each member of the committee is independent as defined by SEC and NYSE rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In addition, the Board has determined that each member of the Audit Committee is an audit committee financial expert and is financially literate in accordance with applicable NYSE and SEC rules.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Management is responsible for the companys internal controls and the financial reporting process.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The companys independent registered public accounting firm is responsible for performing an independent audit of the companys consolidated financial statements and the effectiveness of the companys internal controls over financial reporting in accordance with the standards of the Public Company Accounting Oversight Board (United States) (PCAOB), and issuing reports thereon.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for overseeing the conduct of these activities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committees function is more fully described in its charter, which has been approved by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The charter can be viewed, together with any future changes, on our website at http://ir.prologis.com/governance.cfm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have reviewed and discussed the companys audited financial statements for the fiscal year ended December 31, 2016 and unaudited financial statements for the quarterly periods ended March 31, June 30 and September 30, 2016 with management and KPMG LLP, the companys independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also reviewed and discussed managements assessment of the effectiveness of the companys internal controls over financial reporting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee has discussed with KPMG LLP the matters that are required to be discussed by Auditing Standard No. 16, Communication With Audit Committees, issued by the PCAOB.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KPMG LLP has provided to the company the written disclosures and the letter required by applicable PCAOB requirements regarding their communications with the Audit Committee concerning independence, and the Audit Committee has discussed with KPMG LLP its independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The committee also concluded that KPMG LLPs performance of non-audit services to us and our affiliates, as pre-approved by the committee and described in the next section, does not impair KPMG LLPs independence.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Based on the considerations referred to above, the Audit Committee recommended to the Board that the audited financial statements be included in our Annual Report on Form 10-K for 2016.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The foregoing report is provided by the following independent directors, who constitute the committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Committee:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: J. Michael Losh (Chair)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee engaged KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the fiscal years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KPMG LLP was also retained to provide certain audit-related and tax services in 2016 and 2015.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the course of the provision of services on our behalf, we recognize the importance of our independent registered public accounting firms ability to maintain objectivity and independence in its audit of our financial statements and the importance of minimizing any relationships that could appear to impair that objectivity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To that end, the Audit Committee has adopted policies and procedures governing the pre-approval of audit and non-audit work performed by our independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The independent registered public accounting firm is authorized to perform specified pre-approved services up to certain annual amounts and up to specified amounts for specific services.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Such limits vary by the type of service provided.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Individual engagements anticipated to exceed pre-established thresholds must be separately approved.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All of the fees reflected below for 2016 and 2015 were either specifically pre-approved by the Audit Committee or pre-approved pursuant to the Audit Committees Audit and Non-Audit Services Pre-Approval Policy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: These policies and procedures also detail certain services which the independent registered public accounting firm is prohibited from providing to us.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table represents fees for professional audit services rendered for the audit of our consolidated financial statements for the years ended December 31, 2016 and 2015 and fees billed for other services rendered in each year.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Types of Fees 2016 2015 Audit fees(1) $ 4,378,265 $ 4,843,232 Audit-related fees(2)  42,500 Tax fees(3) 324,883 309,083 All other fees(4)   Totals $4,703,148 $5,194,815
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (1) Audit fees consists of fees for professional services for the audit of our consolidated financial statements included in our Annual Report on Form 10-K and the review of our consolidated financial statements included in our Quarterly Reports on Form 10-Q, including all services required to comply with the standards of the PCAOB, and fees associated with performing the integrated audit of internal controls over financial reporting (Sarbanes-Oxley Section 404 work).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additionally, amounts include fees for services associated with comfort letters, statutory audits and reviews of documents filed with the SEC.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (3) Tax fees are primarily fees for tax complian (4) No other fees were billed for 2016 or 2015
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Ratification of the Appointment of the Independent Registered Public Accounting Firm (Proposal 4)
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is directly responsible for the appointment, compensation, retention and oversight of our independent registered public accounting firm retained to audit our financial statements.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee has appointed KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KPMG LLP has been our external auditors since 2002.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee is responsible for the audit fee negotiations associated with the companys retention of KPMG LLP.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In order to ensure continuing auditor independence, the Audit Committee periodically considers whether there should be a regular rotation of the independent registered public accounting firm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In conjunction with the mandated rotation of KPMG LLPs lead engagement partner, the Audit Committee and its chairperson are directly involved in the selection of KPMG LLPs new lead engagement partner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Audit Committee and the Board believe that the continued retention of KPMG LLP to serve as our independent registered public accounting firm is in the best interest of the company and our stockholders.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Audit Matters
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are asking our stockholders to ratify the selection of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event our stockholders do not approve the appointment, the appointment will be reconsidered by the Audit Committee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: KPMG LLP representatives are expected to attend the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: They will have an opportunity to make a statement if they desire to do so and will be available to respond to appropriate stockholder questions.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote for, vote against, or abstain from voting on ratifying the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assuming a quorum is present, to be approved by the stockholders, the proposal must receive the affirmative vote of a majority of the shares of common stock having voting power present in person or by proxy at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes are considered voting power present in person or by proxy and thus will have the same effect as votes cast Against the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board unanimously recommends that the stockholders vote FOR the ratification of the appointment of KPMG LLP as our independent registered public accounting firm for the year 2017.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy Materials and Voting Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board is soliciting proxies to be voted at the 2017 annual meeting of stockholders and at any adjournment(s) or postponement(s) thereof.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The annual meeting of stockholders will be held on May 3, 2017 at Le Meridien located at 333 Battery Street, San Francisco, California 94111, beginning at 1:30 p.m., Pacific time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This proxy statement contains important information for you to consider when deciding how to vote on the matters brought before the meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please read it carefully.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In accordance with the rules of the SEC, instead of mailing a printed copy of the proxy materials to each stockholder of record or beneficial owner, we furnish proxy materials (our 2017 Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, which includes our Annual Report on Form 10-K) to many of our stockholders by providing access to such documents through the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders will receive printed copies of the proxy materials if they have elected this form of delivery or they are participants in our 401(k) Plan.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Printed copies of the proxy materials will be provided upon request at no charge by submitting a written notice to Investor Relations, Prologis, Inc., Pier 1, Bay 1, San Francisco, California 94111.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 24, 2017, the Notice of Annual Meeting and Internet Availability of Proxy Materials (Notice of Internet Availability) will be distributed to many of our stockholders, either in printed form by mail or electronically by email, in lieu of mailing the printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability instructs stockholders as to how they may:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) access and review all of the proxy materials through the Internet;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) submit their proxy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) receive printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Also on or about March 24, 2017, printed proxy materials, including our 2017 Proxy Statement and our Annual Report on Form 10-K for 2016, will be mailed to all other stockholders, as requested or required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the mailing date, all stockholders and beneficial owners will have the ability to access all of the proxy materials on the Internet at www.proxyvote.com or http://ir.prologis.com/annuals.cfm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may request to receive printed proxy materials by mail or electronically by e-mail by following the instructions included in the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Providing future proxy materials electronically by e-mail saves some of the costs associated with printing and delivering the materials and reduces the environmental impact of our annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: An election to receive proxy materials electronically by e-mail will remain in effect until such time as the stockholder elects to terminate it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your vote is very important.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For this reason, the Board is requesting that you permit your common stock to be represented and voted at the annual meeting by the proxies named on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: To ensure that your shares are voted at the annual meeting, authorize your proxy by telephone, through the Internet or by completing, signing, dating and returning the proxy card provided with the printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you may still attend the annual meeting and vote despite having previously authorized your proxy by any of these methods.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Any proxy may be revoked in the manner described below at any time prior to its exercise at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders must bring proof of current ownership of our common stock to be admitted to and attend the 2017 annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: For shares held in street name through a broker or other nominee, the broker or nominee is not permitted to exercise voting discretion with respect to certain of the matters to be acted upon at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If specific instructions are not provided, the stockholders shares will not be voted on those matters.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Shares represented by such broker non-votes will, however, be counted in determining whether there is a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy and Annual Meeting FAQ
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Proxy materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We are required under SEC regulations to provide you with a proxy statement when we ask you to sign a proxy designating individuals to vote on your behalf.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A proxy is a legal designation of another person to vote the stock you own, which person is also referred to as your proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This designation may be done in a written document that is called a proxy or proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The proxy materials consist of our 2017 Proxy Statement and our 2016 Annual Report to Stockholders, which includes our 2016 Annual Report on Form 10-K.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Notice of Internet Availability
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We have implemented the Notice and Access Rule enacted by the SEC for distribution of materials for our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, we are sending a Notice of Internet Availability to many of our stockholders of record and our beneficial owners.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All stockholders will be able to access the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that the electronic availability of materials is an appropriate proxy communication solution that will allow us to provide our stockholders with the materials they need, while lowering the cost of delivery and reducing the environmental impact of our annual meetings.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may request to receive printed copies of the proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Distribution of proxy materials
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability will be distributed to many of our stockholders, either in printed form by mail or electronically by email, in lieu of mailing the printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability instructs stockholders as to how they may:
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (i) access and review all of the proxy materials through the Internet;
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (ii) submit their proxy; and
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: (iii) receive printed proxy materials.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On or about March 24, 2017, printed proxy materials will be mailed to all other stockholders, as requested or required.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: On the mailing date, all stockholders and beneficial owners will have the ability to access all of the proxy materials on the Internet at www.proxyvote.com or http://ir.prologis.com/annuals.cfm.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Stockholders may request to receive proxy materials electronically by e-mail on an ongoing basis by selecting the link Consent for Electronic Delivery at http://ir.prologis.com/annual-reports.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You can also sign up for electronic delivery of proxy materials by following the instructions on the proxy card with respect to how to vote using the Internet and, when prompted, indicate that you agree to receive or access proxy materials electronically in future years.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you register to receive future proxy materials electronically by e-mail, you will receive an e-mail next year with instructions on how to access those proxy materials and how to vote.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you change your e-mail address, you will need to update your registration.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your election on how to receive proxy materials will remain in effect until you terminate it.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting in person at the annual meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If your shares are registered directly in your name with our transfer agent, Computershare Trust Company, N.A., you are considered the stockholder of record with respect to those shares and a Notice of Internet Availability or printed proxy materials and a proxy card are being sent directly to you.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the stockholder of record, you have the right to vote in person at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you choose to vote in person at the annual meeting, you can bring the proxy card mailed to you if you received printed proxy materials, or you can vote using a ballot that will be provided to you at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Even if you plan to attend the annual meeting, we recommend that you authorize your proxy to vote your shares in advance so that your vote will be counted should you later decide not to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Most of our stockholders hold their shares in street name through a broker, bank, trustee, or other nominee rather than directly in their own name.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In this case, you are considered the beneficial owner of shares held in street name, and a Notice of Internet Availability or printed proxy materials are being forwarded to you together with a voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As the beneficial owner, you are also invited to attend the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: However, because a beneficial owner is not the stockholder of record, you may not vote these shares in person at the annual meeting unless you obtain a legal proxy from the broker, bank, trustee, or nominee that holds your shares, which will give you the right to vote the shares at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to contact your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee to obtain a legal proxy.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You will need to bring that legal proxy to the annual meeting in order to vote in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Voting without attending the annual meeting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Whether you hold shares directly as a stockholder of record or beneficially in street name, you may direct your vote without attending the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may vote by granting a proxy or, for shares held in street name, by submitting voting instructions to your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In most cases, you will be able to do this by telephone, through the Internet, or by mail.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, please refer to the summary instructions on the proxy card included with your proxy materials or the instructions on how to vote contained in the Notice of Internet Availability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name, the voting instructions will be communicated to you by your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Notice of Internet Availability also provides instructions on how you can request a printed copy of the proxy materials and proxy card, if you desire.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By Telephone or through the InternetIf you have telephone or Internet access, you may submit your proxy by following the instructions included with your proxy materials or, if you requested a printed copy of the proxy materials, on the proxy card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you provide specific voting instructions, your shares will be voted as you have instructed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By MailIf you requested a printed copy of the proxy materials, you may submit your proxy by mail by signing the proxy card or, for shares held in street name, by following the voting instruction card included by your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee and mailing it in the postage-paid envelope that is included.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you provide specific voting instructions, your shares will be voted as you have instructed.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and Internet proxy voting facilities for stockholders of record will close at 11:59 p.m., Eastern time, on May 2, 2017, unless the meeting is postponed or adjourned, in which case such voting facilities may remain open or be reopened until the day before the postponed or adjourned meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The availability of telephone and Internet voting for beneficial owners will depend on the voting processes of your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Therefore, we recommend that you follow the voting instructions in the materials you receive from your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you vote by telephone or through the Internet, you do not have to return a proxy card or voting instruction card.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The telephone and Internet proxy voting procedures are designed to authenticate stockholders by use of a control number and to allow stockholders to confirm that their instructions have been properly recorded.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The method by which you vote will in no way limit your right to vote at the annual meeting if you later decide to attend the annual meeting in person.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: You may revoke your proxy at any time and change your vote at any time before the final vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are a stockholder of record, you may do this by signing and submitting a written notice to Edward S. Nekritz, Secretary, Prologis, Inc., Pier 1, Bay 1, San Francisco, California 94111, by submitting a new proxy card with a later date, by voting again by telephone or through the Internet (your latest telephone or Internet proxy is counted), or by attending the annual meeting in person and voting by ballot at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: your shares beneficially in street name, you will need to contact your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee to determine the process for revoking a voting instruction.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Merely attending the annual meeting will not revoke a proxy unless you specifically request your proxy to be revoked.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: All shares that have been properly voted (for which proxies have not been revoked) will be voted at the annual meeting.

sentences.text: Specific voting instructions not given
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares directly in your name, and you sign and return a proxy card without giving specific voting instructions, the shares of common stock represented by that proxy will be voted as recommended by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold your shares in street name through a broker, bank, trustee, or nominee and you do not provide specific voting instructions, your broker, bank, trustee, or nominee will have discretion to vote such shares but only with respect to routine matters (Proposal 4).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If no voting instructions are received from you, and you hold your shares in street name, your broker, bank, trustee or nominee will not turn in a proxy card for your shares on the non-routine matters proposed at our annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-routine matters are the election of directors (Proposal 1), the advisory vote to approve the companys executive compensation for 2016 (Proposal 2) and the advisory vote on the frequency of future advisory votes on the companys executive compensation (Proposal 3).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you hold shares in your 401(k) Plan account and do not provide the trustee of the 401(k) Plan with specific voting instructions, the trustee will vote all uninstructed shares held in our 401(k) Plan in the same proportion as how instructed shares held in the 401(k) Plan are voted.

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Who can vote
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Each issued and outstanding share of common stock is entitled to one vote on each matter properly brought before the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Holders of record of Prologis common stock at the close of business on the record date, March 9, 2017, are entitled to notice of and to vote at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As of March 9, 2017, there were 529,559,791 shares of our common stock outstanding.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Quorum requirement
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: There is no right to cumulative voting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A quorum is met if a majority of the shares of common stock outstanding as of the record date are represented, in person or by proxy, at the annual meeting.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Your shares are counted as present at the meeting if you are present and entitled to vote in person at the meeting, if you have properly submitted a proxy card, or if you authorize your proxy to vote your shares by telephone or through the Internet.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If you are present at the annual meeting in person or by proxy, but you abstain from voting on any or all proposals, your shares are still counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Broker non-votes are also counted as present and entitled to vote for purposes of determining a quorum.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A broker non-vote occurs when a nominee holding shares of our common stock for a beneficial owner is present at the meeting, in person or by proxy, and entitled to vote, but does not vote on a particular proposal because the nominee does not have discretionary voting power with respect to that item and has not received instructions on how to vote with respect to that item from the beneficial owner.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Majority voting
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Our bylaws provide that the vote required for election of directors is a majority vote of the votes cast in uncontested elections of directors.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Accordingly, directors are required to be elected by the majority of votes cast
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Additional Information
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: by the shares present in person or represented by proxy with respect to such director in uncontested elections.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: A majority of the votes cast means that the number of shares voted For a director nominee by the holders of shares of common stock entitled to vote on the election of directors and represented in person or by proxy at the annual meeting must exceed the number of such shares voted Against the director nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Abstentions and broker non-votes, if any, will have no effect on the outcome of the proposal.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In a contested election (where a determination is made that the number of director nominees is expected to exceed the number of directors to be elected at a meeting), the vote standard will be a plurality of the votes cast with respect to such director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: In the event of a contested election where the plurality vote standard applies, stockholders shall be permitted to vote only for a director nominee or to designate their vote be withheld from such nominee.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If a nominee who is serving as a director is not elected by a majority vote at the annual meeting, then, under Maryland law, such director would continue to serve as a holdover director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Under our bylaws, any director who fails to be elected by a majority vote shall tender his or her resignation to the Board, subject to acceptance by the Board.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Governance Committee will make a recommendation to the Board on whether to accept or reject the resignation, or whether other action should be taken.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The Board will then act on the Governance Committees recommendation and publicly disclose its decision and the rationale behind it within 90 days from the date of the certification of election results.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: If the resignation is not accepted, the director will continue to serve until the next annual meeting and until the directors successor is duly elected and qualified.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The director who tenders his or her resignation will not participate in the Boards decision.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Non-incumbent directors who are not elected at the annual meeting would not become directors and would not serve on the Board as a holdover director.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendix A: Definitions and Reconciliations of GAAP and Non-GAAP Financial Measures
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: APPENDIX A: DEFINITIONS AND RECONCILIATIONS OF GAAP AND NON-GAAP FINANCIAL MEASURES
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Please refer to our annual and quarterly financial statements filed with the Securities and Exchange Commission on Forms 10-K and 10-Q and other public reports for further information about us and our business.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted EBITDA.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We use Adjusted EBITDA, a non-Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (GAAP) financial measure, as a measure of our operating performance.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We calculate Adjusted EBITDA beginning with consolidated net earnings attributable to common stockholders and removing the effect of interest, income taxes, depreciation and amortization, impairment charges, third-party acquisition expenses related to the acquisition of real estate, gains or losses from the acquisition or disposition of investments in real estate (other than from land and development properties), gains from the revaluation of equity investments upon acquisition of a controlling interest, gains or losses on early extinguishment of debt and derivative contracts (including cash charges), similar adjustments we make to our FFO measures (see definition below), and other items, such as stock based compensation and unrealized gains or losses on foreign currency.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We make adjustments to reflect our economic ownership in each entity in which we invest, whether consolidated or unconsolidated.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We consider Adjusted EBITDA to provide investors relevant and useful information because it permits investors to view our operating performance on an unleveraged basis before the effects of income tax, non-cash depreciation and amortization expense, gains and losses on the disposition of non-development properties and other items (outlined above), that affect comparability.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We also include a pro forma adjustment in Adjusted EBITDA to reflect a full period of NOI (as defined below) on the operating properties we acquire and stabilize and to remove NOI on properties we dispose of during the quarters, assuming the transaction occurred at the beginning of the quarter.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By excluding interest expense, Adjusted EBITDA allows investors to measure our operating performance independent of our capital structure and indebtedness and, therefore, allows for a more meaningful comparison of our operating performance to that of other companies, both in the real estate industry and in other industries.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Gains and losses on the early extinguishment of debt generally include the costs of repurchasing debt securities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While not infrequent or unusual in nature, these items result from market fluctuations that can have inconsistent effects on our results of operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The economics underlying these items reflect market and financing conditions in the short-term but can obscure our performance and the value of our long-term investment decisions and strategies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that Adjusted EBITDA helps investors to analyze our ability to meet interest payment obligations and to make quarterly preferred share dividends.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We believe that investors should consider Adjusted EBITDA in conjunction with net earnings and the other GAAP measures of our performance to improve their understanding of our operating results, and to make more meaningful comparisons of our performance against other companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: By using Adjusted EBITDA, an investor is assessing the earnings generated by our operations but not taking into account the eliminated expenses or gains incurred in connection with such operations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: As a result, Adjusted EBITDA has limitations as an analytical tool and should be used in conjunction with our GAAP presentations.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Adjusted EBITDA does not reflect our historical cash expenditures or future cash requirements for working capital, capital expenditures, distribution requirements, contractual commitments or interest and principal payments on our outstanding debt.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: While EBITDA is a relevant and widely used measure of operating performance, it does not represent net income as defined by GAAP and it should not be considered as an alternative to those indicators in evaluating operating performance or liquidity.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Further, our computation of Adjusted EBITDA may not be comparable to EBITDA reported by other companies.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We compensate for the limitations of Adjusted EBITDA by providing investors with financial statements prepared according to GAAP, along with this detailed discussion of Adjusted EBITDA and a reconciliation to Adjusted EBITDA from consolidated net earnings, a GAAP measurement.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: The following table reconciles our net earnings for the fourth quarter of 2016 to Adjusted EBITDA for the same periods (in thousands).
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Appendix A: Definitions and Reconciliations of GAAP and Non-GAAP Financial Measures

sentences.text: Annualized FFO Growth Rate is average year-on-year growth rate of Core FFO per share, over a period of time, reflecting the rate on an annual basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Annualized TSR is calculated based on the stock price appreciation and dividends paid to show a total return to a stockholder over a period of time.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: This calculation assumes dividends are reinvested into the stock on the day the dividend is paid.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We annualize TSR by converting the total return of the stock at the end of a prescribed time period to an annualized basis.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Asset Management Fees represents the third-party share of asset management and transactional fees from both consolidated and unconsolidated co-investment ventures.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: Assets Under Management (AUM) represents the estimated value of the real estate we own or manage through both our consolidated and unconsolidated entities.
sentences.label: UNKNOWN

sentences.text: We calculate AUM by adding the third-party investors share of the estimated fair value of the assets in the co-investment ventures to our share of total market capitalization (calculated using the market price of our equity plus our share of total debt).
